name: Sophia Lee
persona: Sophia Lee is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently excels academically, maintaining a stellar 3.96 CGPA. She is highly motivated by her desire to achieve top grades and approaches her studies with exceptional discipline and perseverance. Sophia's confidence in her academic abilities helps her manage stress effectively, allowing her to perform well under pressure. Her strong work ethic and passion for science drive her to seek research opportunities and leadership roles in campus organizations.
